result.execSummary:
The defendant Joel Omar Santos was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possession of Marijuana. This is not a criminal offense and results only in a money penalty for this offense.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: Milwaukee County Clerk of Circuit Court

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Joel Omar Santos

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Defendant Joel Omar Santos in court with attorney Gabriela A Leija.   Student Intern Patrick O'Keefe under the supervision of Assistant District Attorney Alex T. Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  On state's motion, Court ordered charge amended to posession of THC, contrary to County Ordinance 24.01. Defendant enters a plea of guilty. Court found the Defendant guilty. Court orders Defendant to pay a forfeiture of $50.00 including costs to be paid by 01-08-2016 or Civil Judgment.
Defendant Joel Omar Santos in court with attorney Gabriela A Leija.  Alex T. Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for November 9, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Joel Omar Santos in court with attorney Torrie R. Williams.  Alex T. Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Parties are notified that effective September 14, 2015 this case will be reassigned to Judge Michelle Ackerman Havas, Branch 45 in Room 515 of the Courthouse. Case adjourned for Plea & Sentencing at request of defense counsel.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for September 25, 2015 at 01:30 pm.
Plea/sentencing hearing on September 8, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Case calendared for projected guilty plea and sentencing on August 27, 2015 at 1:30 p.m. COURT IS DOWN IN THE P.M. Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea and sentencing in Branch 23 on September 8. 2015 at 1:30 p.m.   Deputy Court Clerk: TC.

Defendant Joel Omar Santos in court with attorney Torrie R. Williams.  Katherine Halopka-Ivery appeared for the State of Wisconsin. CMC. Request for Substitution of Judge received and filed.  Court consented to substitution against Judge Siefert.  Parties are advised the Clerk of Circuit Court reassigned case pursuant to current court rules to Reserve Judge, Br. 45. Defense requests a Plea and Sentencing date. Case adjourned to branch 45.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for August 27, 2015 at 01:30 pm.
No use or possession of any controlled substances without a valid prescription  Pre-trial conference scheduled for 06-24-2015 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Joel Omar Santos in court.  Ann R. LÃ³pez appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defendant advised that this case is assigned to Judge Siefert, Branch 47.
Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.   Defendant received a copy of the complaint and was advised of right to counsel and maximum penalties.  Court entered a plea of not guilty on behalf of the Defendant. Court reserves Defendant's right to file a substitution of judge pursuant to Sec. 971.20 until Defendant's next scheduled court appearance.  Defendant IS Public Defender eligible.  Defendant is ordered to provide the public defender's office with the next court date.  The case is adjourned to Br.47  for a Pretrial Conference.vb
